text:

creator: mparker@computer.org

text:
Jikes compilation works for me (latest version of TC4, jikes 1.18). Did you 
set the -Dbuild.compiler.emacs=true property? If you still expereince this 
issue, the tomcat-user mailing list is the best forum for following this up.
creator: markt@apache.org
